fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Brave Bird: Crash into one players house to deal an Unstoppable attack, but also deal a Basic attack to yourself on the same night. (1 use)
- Close Combat: Pummel another player with a Powerful attack, setting your Defense to Vulnerable the following night. (2 uses)
- Agility: Choose one player to grant a speed boost to. Their next night action will resolve immediately. (2 uses)
- Wing Attack: Smack a player with your wing, dealing a Basic attack to them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Staraptor's Defense cannot be improved when it is Vulnerable.
- Agility cannot self-target in games where that is allowed.
- Using Close Combat while having Vulnerable Defense counts as one visit towards yourself.

fields.name: Pokemon Ability:
fields.value: - Intimidate: The first time you are attacked, lower the attack's value by one stage.
